alert.note: Alert for Grant; Hettinger; Morton (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 19 at 5:29AM CDT until September 19 at 6:30AM CDT by NWS Bismarck
info.description: The National Weather Service in Bismarck has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Hettinger County in southwestern North Dakota... Western Morton County in south central North Dakota... Northwestern Grant County in south central North Dakota... * Until 630 AM CDT/530 AM MDT/. * At 529 AM CDT/429 AM MDT/, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 4 miles west of Heart Butte Dam to 9 miles northwest of New Leipzig, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Heart Butte Dam around 455 AM MDT. Almont around 605 AM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
